Song.title: Glory To God In The Highest
Song.copyright: Words and Music by Stephen Altrogge © 2006 Sovereign Grace Praise
Song.amazon_links: [{"asin":"B0012AM5ZA","title":"Glory to God in the Highest","artist":"Sovereign Grace Music","image_url":"http:\/\/ecx.images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/61AitRsTtfL._SL75_.jpg"}]

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: D | D/F# | Gmaj7 | Gmaj7 :||]
Verse 1: [D] [ ]Hear the angels [D/F#]sing{,} of the King of [Gmaj7]kings Who [Bm]made Himself [A]poor [D] [ ]See the myster[D/F#]y and the majest[Gmaj7]y The Cre[Bm]ator is [A]born Oh the [Bm]Maker be[F#m]came a [Gmaj7]man Let us [Bm]sing what the [F#m]angels [G2]sang
Chorus: Glory to [Em7]God [A]in the [D]highest Glory to [Em7]God [A]in the [D]highest Our [Bm]hope has ap[A]peared [C2]God has drawn near [G]Glory to [A]God a[D | D/F# | Gmaj7 | Bm A]lone
Verse 2: [D] [ ]See the One who [D/F#]spans{,} the heavens with His [Gmaj7]hand With [Bm]fingers so [A]small [D] [ ]See this babe so [D/F#]poor{,} all of heav’n a[Gmaj7]dores He’s the [Bm]ruler of [A]all Let us [Bm]worship our [F#m]humble [Gmaj7]King Ador[Bm]ation we [F#m]humbly [G2]bring
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 hear the angels sing of the king of kings who made himself poor see the mystery and the majesty the creator is born oh the maker became a man let us sing what the angels sang chorus glory to god in the highest glory to god in the highest our hope has appeared god has drawn near glory to god alone verse 2 see the one who spans the heavens with his hand with fingers so small see this babe so poor all of heavn adores hes the ruler of all let us worship our humble king adoration we humbly bring
